mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.user_login_id userLoginId, ur.role_id remark FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_user_role ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE u.user_login_id = #{userLoginId} AND u.password1 = #{password1} AND u.is_logout = '0'

SELECT rs.resource_id resourceId, rs.resource_url resourceUrl, rs.resource_order resourceOrder, rs.parent_id parentId, rs.resource_desc resourceDesc, rs.resource_title resourceTitle, rs.resource_type resourceType, rs.in_page_name inPageName FROM tb_user_role ur, tb_role r ,tb_role_resource rp, tb_resource rs WHERE ur.role_id = r.role_id and r.role_id = rp.role_id and rp.resource_id = rs.resource_id and ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY rs.resource_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_role_privilege ( role_id, resource_id ) VALUES ( #{role_id}, #{resource_id} )
mapper.select: select resource_id resourceId from tb_role_privilege where role_id = #{role_id}
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_material WHERE warehouse_id = #{warehouse_id}) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_product WHERE AREA = #{warehouse_id})

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(sm.id, sm.mat_supplier_name) FROM t_supplier AS s LEFT JOIN t_supply_mat AS sm ON s.id = sm.supply_id LEFT JOIN t_material AS m ON sm.id = m.supplymat_id LEFT JOIN t_warehouse AS w ON m.warehouse_id = w.id WHERE w.id IS NOT NULL AND s.id = #{id}
